title: Small Man Complex: A Screenplay
description: He's not a little boy; he's a little man.When average, semi-hard worker Tom Manginer is afflicted by an embarrassing shrinking condition, he compensates with a massive, debilitating small man complex.Available for the first time, the full length feature film screenplay, from the writers of Women on A Dud's TaleWith an introduction by Tom Cruise.
author: Daniel Silman
